definition: to give oneself up/to surrender (to the authorities)
head/chief/first (occasion, thing etc)/classifier for poems, songs etc

sentences.english: We must stop him from giving himself up.
sentences.chinese: 我们必须阻止他投案自首。

sentences.english: The horse won the race by two lengths.
sentences.chinese: 那马以两个自首至尾的距离领先赢得该场比赛。

sentences.english: The rubber gaudio-videoe himself up to the police after two weeks on the run.
sentences.chinese: 那个抢劫犯在押窜了两个星期后向警方自首了。

sentences.english: Steady rollin woman gonna come my way.
sentences.chinese: 稳步辊女子前来自首途中。

sentences.english: News came that the murderer had given himself up.
sentences.chinese: 有消息说，杀人犯已经投案自首了。

sentences.english: That officer, Liu Linan, was given leniency after turning himself in.
sentences.chinese: 这名警察叫刘力男，他由于自首而被宽大处理。

sentences.english: Any criminal who voluntarily surrenders may be given a lighter or mitigated punishment.
sentences.chinese: 对于自首的犯罪分子，可以从轻或者减轻处罚。

sentences.english: He has been given until noon today to turn himself in to authorities.
sentences.chinese: 他被要求在今天中午前向当局投案自首。

sentences.english: The basic principle of voluntary surrender hadn't changed by the end of Qing Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 唐律自首制度的基本原则始终未变。

sentences.english: After three days, the hijackers surrendered to the police .
sentences.chinese: 三天后，劫机犯向警察局自首了。

sentences.english: We advised the burglar to surrender himself to the police.
sentences.chinese: 我们规劝窃贼向警方投案自首。

sentences.english: The murderer delivered himself up to justice.
sentences.chinese: 那个凶手向司法部门投案自首。

sentences.english: To surrender myself means what they did is right.
sentences.chinese: 自首的话就意味着他们做的一切是对的。

sentences.english: Go to the police and tell what you have done. You should know the importance of locking the barn door after the horse was stolen.
sentences.chinese: 到警察局去自首，你应该知道亡羊补牢的重要性。

sentences.english: Secondly, the thesis studies the accomplice problem of traffic accident guilty, explains if the common unintentional crime will be established.
sentences.chinese: 论文第五章对交通肇事罪的自首与共犯进行研究。

sentences.english: The rubfeelr gaudio-videoe himself up to the police after two weeks on the run.
sentences.chinese: 那个抢劫犯在押窜了两个星期后向警方自首了。

definition: to surrender to the authorities/to turn oneself in (for a crime)
to bring to justice/to file away (a document)
to retract testimony/to withdraw a confession
to make an appearance in court
to report a case to the authorities
to take the blame for sb else/to compensate for one's crime/to get charges dropped (by paying money etc)
